inn1.comm: good bounce, some movement on that as it pitches outside off stump and swings away, Gayle chases it but cant reach it, and a wide is called
better ball, a good length on off stump, good carry too as Gayle hops and defends back to Gul
good one, pitches outside off stump and shaves away past Gayle's bat, moves atleast a foot and a half
good length on the stumps, cramps Gayle for room and he has to defend back to Gul, who's hit an impressive length first up
good movement and bounce on that one too, as it pitches outside off stump and swings away, Gayle leaves it alone as he gets behind the line
beauty! Pitches outside off, draws Gayle into his hurried defence, and somehow misses kissing the egde of the bat as it angles past him sharply
fuller outside off and moves away once more, Gayle leaves well alone

and he's gone! First ball duck! Full and furious on off stump, swings in late, superb ball that, Lara plays all over it, a poor shot selection, you'd have to say, and he's caught in front of middle, crucial strike
good, moving ball outside off stump, Simmons lets it go through to Akmal
good ball again, fullish outside off stump and moves away, again Simmons plays it safe and shoulders arms
full again outside off stump, pitches and moves away quite sharply, Simmons thinks about the forward defence but then withdraws at the last minute as it moves away
full and smack on the stumps, pitched on middle and leg and moved away to off stump, impressive ball, Simmons gets behind and defends compactly
right up there, full outside off stump and moves away once more, Simmons covers off stump and shoulders arms
pitches short outside off stump, Gayle in two minds, tried to play it and then leaves it, ball takes the edge of the bat and runs down the ground past gully for one
a good length outside off stump, Simmons too unsure of the movement, hops back and opens the face of the bat, luckily the ball scoots past second slip and runs away for runs
a good, fast ball outside off stump, Gayle runs that past gully for one more
lands around off stump and moves in, Simmons hops across and looks to work it fine, ball clips his upper thigh
good ball, Gayle comes forward and looks to work it fine, cramped for room and ends up defending but they steal a quick run anyways
full outside off stump, keeps low and moves away for Akmal to take, Simmons shoulders arms again
fullish outside off stump, pitches and swings in, Gayle leaves it alone
full outside off stump, Gayle shuffles across and shoulders arms, ball moves in and raps him on the pads but he's way outside the line
good length outside off stump, again he shuffles and counters  the swing by presenting the full face of the bat, ball rolls into the covers and they pinch a run
full on leg stump, easily worked backward of square for a single
pitches on middle and off and moves in, Gayle is caught on the hop and rapped high on the thigh, ball would have swung over leg stump, no appeal
good length ball outside off stump, gets some kick off the pitch, Gayle stands and defends, takes the bottom hand off the bat in the process
short of a good length outside off, moves in and Gayle is caught hopping as he works that into the onside, ball took him high on the bat, he calls for a quick run and gets it
short of a good length outside off stump, ball just sits up and Gayle pulls from outside off past Gul's outstretched left hand, not timed well but its powerfully hit and beats mid-on for four
fullish outside off stump, Gayle backs away, exposing all the stumps, and thwacks that hard down the ground, Gul has no time to react and cops it on the shin, ball ricochets to mid-off, ouch
slammed! Again Gul pitches one short outside off stump, and Gayle picks it from where it landed and pulls through the unprotected onside field
slower and fuller on off stump, Gayle gets behind the line of the ball and defends into the offside
shortish on middle and leg, Gayle hops, up goes the right leg and he pulls that hard through square leg for four more
slower ball again, moves away from outside off stump and Gayle reaches out, taps it past gully for one to retain the strike
full outside off stump, Gayle just picks that up and slams it down the ground over mid-on for four, hit hard, typical Gayle aggression
full outside off stump, pitches and stays very low and Gayle watches it, decides t leave it alone, and Rana's over-stepped so they'll get a run anyways
SMOKED! Pitches very short and Gayle covers the stumps and hammers that from the stumps hard and flat over midwicket for six&
and he no-balls again, lands on a short of a good length outside off and Gayle defends into the covers
he oversteps again, lands it short on the stumps, Gayle backs away and tries the pull again, caught on the thigh well outside leg stump
slower ball, well bowled, swings in and Gayle defends to point by opening the face of the bat
short and wide, asking for trouble, back goes Gayle in a flash and he murders that off the backfoot through the offside gap, Shoaib Malik gives chase but that ball was headed for the ropes
short outside off again, moves in and Gayle hops in his crease, uses the wrists and works that through the midwicket gap for four more
slower ball again outside off, stays low and Gayle gets down and pushes into the covers, Rana gets a dot ball into the over
good length outside off stump, Simmons goes back and across and defends with a straight bat
short of a good length outside off stump, Simmons gets on top of the bounce and pushes that between cover and point off the backfoot, they run hard and get three
good ball outside off stump, pitches and moves across him, Gayle covers off and dabs that towards point for one
good ball, pitches on a good length outside off and cuts in sharply, Simmons tries a cheeky dab but gets squared up and the ball zoots by him
fuller, but just a tad, outside off stump and moves in, Simmons gets an inside edge as he defends
good length on off stump, forces Simmons to go back and across and defend back to Gul
full and slow outside off stump, pitches very wide of off stump and the umpire signals so, nerves for Rana?
wide outside leg stumps, Gayle eases that around the corner for for to fine leg and thats the 50 for West Indies
a good length on the stumps, Gayle backs away and tries to drive through point but finds Malik there
quicker ball this time, on middle and leg, Gayle goes back and defends to the onside
short of a good length outside off stump, Gayle opens the face but cant beat the man at backward point
good ball! Full and swinging outside off stump, Gayle drawn forward and fishes at it, misses the edge and Akmal takes it

got em! Victory for Rana Naved! Pitches on off stump, good movement in, Gayle comes forward and defends, ball raps him on the pads in front of middle and off, and umpire Nigel Llong again raises the finger, Rana exults!
back of a good length on middle and leg, worked straight to square leg
back of a good length outside off stump, he goes back and flashes the drive, inside edge
fullish and wide of off stump, Simmons watches it through to Akmal
short of a good length outside off stump, Simmons goes back and crunches the backfoot drive between cover and point, and gets two
short again, but on the stumps, gets behind the line of the ball and works that to midwicket
fuller on off stump, looks to whip that through midwicket but doesnt time it well enough
lands full outside off stump and moves away, Simmons leaves it alone
good line and length, Simmons comes forward and defends into the covers
fuller this time on off stump, Simmons gets forward and defends, ball rolls to the onside and Rana moves across and takes it in is followthrough
short and wide, Simmons moves back and flashes at it, ball takes the outer edge but stays low and scoots safely past gully for one
full and moving outside off stump, Samuels shoulders arms after covering off stump
rank half volley outside off stump, Samuels eases into his drive and Yousuf at mid-off dives and gets a hand to it, saves three runs
pitches on a short length on the stumps, swings down leg and Samuels is caught high on the thigh guard
short outside off stump, he goes back and opens the face of the bat, picking up three runs in the gap at point
quicker ball this time, outside off stump, Simmons covers the stumps, hops and defends wristily back towards Gul
outside off and moves in, catches him high on the thigh as he hops, ball rolls towards point
good length, slower ball, moves in from outside off and catches him squared up for room looking to work that fine
quicker outside off stump, gets some lift too and he's beaten flashing a nothing drive
dropped! Fullish outside off stump, pitches and draws Samuels into a tame drive, and Imran Farhat at second slip spils a waste-high sitter
full outside off stump, away movement, left alone
full on the stumps, driven to Razzaq at mid-on
full again on off stump, he defends into the covers, thought about the run but sent his partner back
good ball that lands outside off and rears, batsman taken by surprise, plays at it initially and then drops the hands, Akmal takes it high in front of his face
pitches and moves down leg stump, catches him on the pad, Rana and Akmal appeal but umpire Llong shakes his head, probably going high and down leg stump
short and very wide, he swings the bat at it and manages to slap it towards point
better ball, a good length on the stumps, he goes back and defends with a straight bat
short and wide, Samuels goes back and drives that uppishly into the covers where Inzamam dives and gets a hand to it, still runs away for four, and Inzamam is hurt
fullish outside off, Samuels loses his marbles and has a one-handed, nothing swish at it off the backfoot, plays through the line and misses all ends up, somehow the ball misses the top of off stump
good length outside off stump, he drops the hands and runs it past gully for one
full and moving away outside off stump, he comes forward and then leaves it alone with a raise of the bat
full and slower outside off stump, stays low as it swings away, batsman leaves it alone
fuller on the stumps, defended into the on side
lands on leg stump, worked into the midwicket region
full outside off stump, lands and moves away from him as he drives exaggeratedly and gets beaten all ends up
too full on the legs, clipped through square leg and he collects three to his name
a good length outside off stump, draws him forward but then he takes the bat out of harm's way
good, straight delivery and he defends back to Iftikhar

a good length ball outside off stump, pitches and draws Samuels into a loose poke at it, takes the edge and flies fast and low to Farhat at lone slip, ball just hits the ground before popping into his hands, Farhat claims he took it cleanly, both umpires meet to discuss it, and the verdict is OUT....replays suggested that it kisses the grass first, unfortunate for Samuels, if it had gone to the third umpire he'd still be batting
full outside off stump, defended to point
full outside off stump again, he leaves it alone for Akmal
fullish again, played into the covers
full outside off stump again, he shoulders arms for Akmal to take again
full outside off stump, draws Simmons into the drive, ball deviates and they all go up in appeal, no contact with the bat however
fullish outside off stump, comes in and he defends to point
short and wide outside off stump, he cant time the cut well enough and ends up chopping into the ground
good length outside off stump, he gets on top of it and defends into the covers
back of a good length outside off stump, hops and defends, inside edge into the onside
lands on the stumps and kicks up, catches Simmons on the hop, he manages to remove the bottom hand and keeps it down into the offside
full outside off stump, Ganga comes forward and drives that past point for the single
full on off stump, he drives that to mid-off
shorter on the stumps this time, he whips that to square leg
fuller outside off stump, left alone
full outside off stump and nips back in, batsman drives and the ball goes in the gate between bat and pad, well bowled
lands full of off stump and moves away, he comes across and shoulders arms
short and wide, crunched to the man at point
fuller outside off, slower ball, Simmons comes forward and defends to point
back of a good length, punched off the back foot into the covers
good length outside off stump, further up, and he stands leaden-footed and pokes at it, beaten
fuller outside off stump, Simmons shuffles across and flashes a tame drive at it,  beaten once nore, he's not looking comfortable at all now
straighter on the stumps, he gets behind it this time and defends to the on side, Ganga wanted the run but Simmons resisted
full on the stumps, worked around the corner past square leg for one
full outside off stump, comes forward and then leaves it alone
shorter this time outside off stump, Simmons tries to work that past point off the backfoot but his timings all wrong, ends up with an inside edge to the on side
full on off stump, he drops the hands on it and gets another inside edge to square leg, Ganga wants the run
full again outside off stump, comes forward, opens the face and collects one down to third man
good length outside off stump, he covers the line and defends to point
on the stumps and moving down leg, Ganga tries to work it fine but finds the man at square leg instead
great ball that lands outside off stump and shaves past his tame prod forward, Akmal collects
bad ball, lands outside leg stump and swings away, wide called
straighter this time, worked around the corner past square leg for the single
full, a halfvolley, powerfully driven back down the ground, Razzaq tries to stop it, gets a hand but the ball still runs down the ground for four, Simmons's first
fullish outside off stump, left alone by Simmons
full outside off stump, squeezed through the gap at cover, they run well and turn it into a double
full on middle and leg, clipped down to backward square leg for one
short and wide, he drives off the back foot but cant beat point
full on off stump, driven to Gul at mid-on
full and quicker outside off stump, no movement this time, he shoulders arms
short of a length outside off stump, he hops and pushes that to point
shorter outside off stump, he goes back and flashes the drive off the backfoot, ball takes the thick outside edge and shoots wide of the lone slip for four
good length on the stumps, he defends going half-forward and gets an outer edge to point, they steal a run
fullish on middle and leg, angled in, he tries to play it fine, gets an inside edge but the fast outfield carries it through square leg for four
lands on a good length outside off stump and moves in, he jumps and tries to flick that through midwicket but cant beat the man there
fuller outside off stump, drives to cover, cant beat the field on the offside either
short and wide, tries to cut that but the ball stays low and he cant get bat to it, looks to the umpire for the wide, but no luck
short of a good length outside off stump, kicks and he's caught on the hop, manages to keep it down to point
fullish outside off stump, he drives at that and gets an edge past first slip, Rehman at third man fields, fumbles, and allows the second run
full and wide outside off stump, he shoulders arms
good, quick ball outside off stump, pitches and rears at some pace and the batsman can only leave it alone
full outside off once more, not as much kick that time, and again Ganga is comfortable leaving it alone
changes the pace on that one, slower, lands on a good length outside off stump and this time Ganga flirts with it but makes no contact
quick, on a fuller length on middle and leg, works it fine but cant beat square leg
straighter this time, Simmons cant work it beyond the man at midwicket
quicker, on a good length on the stumps, hustles Simmons into his backfoot defence
again he lands it on a nagging length on and around off stump, Simmons can only hip once more and defend it
oversteps, a freebie, lands on that good length outside off stump and Simmons hops and defends down into the ground
this one's speared in fuller, striving for the yorker is Razzaq, but Simmons works that down the ground and Gul at mid-on fields
full outside off stump, driven with a high arm to mid-off, who doesnt field all that cleanly and allows the run
full on off stump, driven hard back to Iftikhar who stops it in his followthrough
full but on leg stump, well clipped through square leg for two
short and wide, he cant time his back-foot drive too well and ends up with one down to third man through gully
fuller this time outside off stump, Ganga gets behind the line and defends stoically into the covers
a tad shorter in length outside off stump, ball gets some lift too and Ganga, trying an ambitious, flashy square-drive, is beaten
straighter this time, he drives but cant beat mid-on

off-cutter and this one came back from wide outside the off stump. Simmons defends off the back-foot and the ball rolls away off the outer half of the bat. Man at point fumbles and they cross over for a single
short of a good length delivery, no real width offered but Ganga leans back and cuts it away towards third man for a single
short rising delivery, on and around the middle and off stump line. Simmons stands tall on the back-foot and defends it with a straight bat
punched down to mid-on. No room for a single there
worked away through square leg for a brace

good length delivery on the middle and leg stump line. Simmons goes back,  gets right behind the line, goes low and punches it straight back down the track to the long-on fence.  All he had to do was beat the fielder at mid-off and the placement was spot-on
similar line and length but Simmons fails to make contact and the ball rolls away off the pad. Appeal for lbw turned down. Clearly missing leg
worked away nicely for an easy single - he is looking good
tossed up outside the off stump, defended watchfully
bowled from round the stumps and on the middle and leg stump line. Ganga goes low down and paddles it down to fine leg
hit on the pad but missing leg
short but close to the off stump line. Ganga leans back and cuts hard but the ball goes straight to the fielder at backward point. Good shot for no runs
turned away against the spin to the square leg region, easy single to end the over
starts off with a wide delivery down the leg side. Akmal effects a stumping but Ganga had his leg safely planted inside the crease
defended watchfully
defended down on the leg side
tossed up and drifting down the leg side. Ganga pushes forward and is beaten but quickly gets his bat behind the crease, well before the bails came off
defended on the back-foot
paddled down to fine leg, more of scoop than a paddle sweep
turning in from outside the off stump. Ganga goes right back and cuts it straight to the fielder at backward point
tossed up and turning away. Simmons gets a good stride in and defends - bat and pad held together. half hearted appeal for lbw turned down
forced away on the off side
again played with the bat nicely tucked away behind the pad
tossed up outside the off stump, defended on the front-foot
excellent length - Simmons stretches forward, looking to drive it through cover but ends up with and inside edge and the ball rolls away behind the stumps on the off side
played away torwards point
comes down the track and is deceived by the flight - goes through with the shot and the ball flies over the fielder  at midwicket
comes forward and takes it on the pad
Simmons too comes down the track, looking to go over the fielder at midwicket - he makes good contact and the ball comfortably sails over the fielder there.
down the leg side
short and wide outside the off stump, Simmons rocks back and chops it away to the backward point fence
defended down on the leg side
beaten outside the off stump
driven away to deep cover for an easy single
tossed up and Simmons takes it on the pad, another half-hearted appeal for lbw turned down
swept away to fine leg
four more! slightly short and turning away. Ganga waits for the ball to turn and cuts late - ball clips the outside edge and races away to the third man fence
tossed up outside the off stump, defended on the front-foot

ripper! tossed up on the middle and off stump line and turning across. Ganga is sucked forward and he plays across the line. Ball turns just enough to miss the outside edge and clips the top of off-stump. Brilliant stuff from Rehman.
hit high on the pad, appeal turned down
tossed up and Simmons works it away behind square on the leg side
way down the leg side and Akmal had no chance of cutting it off
good line and length, Morton stretches forward but is beaten by the turn
slightly short and close to the off stump line. Morton goes right back and softs runs it down to the third man region
gets well forward and takes it on the pad
turning in sharply and the ball rolls away off the pad
swept down to fine leg for a brace and that's his first ODI fifty - well played
forced away towards point
cut away off the back-foot to the gully region - again no room for a single there
another good looking cut shot and this time he gets it through the gap between point and cover
wide outside the off stump and turning away further - Morton has a poke at it and the ball goes through to the keeper
short and turning away,  bowled quicker through the air - Morton goes back and across and punches it away towards point
tossed up outside the off stump, almost an yorker outside the off stump - bit of a surprise delivery. Simmons jams his bat down and ends up with an inside edge onto his pad
defended on the front-foot
worked away towards the leg side
forced away off the back-foot to the cover region
pitched on leg and drifting down leg - Simmons fails to make contact
cut away from right in front of the stumps to the point region -  dangerous shot
again drifting down the leg side, was the quicker delivery and Morton is beaten on the forward prod. Akmal is quick to dislodge the bails but Morton was never in trouble
defended stretching well forward
cut away off the back-foot to deep backward point
worked away against the spin and Morton finds the gap on the leg side - takes on the fielder at deep midwicket and comfortable makes it back for the second run
tossed up and turning away - cut away off the back-foot and once again the ball goes straight ot the fielder at point
in the channel outside the off stump and Morton leaves it through to the keeper
defended on the front-foot
pushed away towards cover and they scamper through for a single - shy at the striker's end fails to hit the target and an extra run is added to the total
good length turning in. Simmons rocks back and drives it away through the gap between the cover fielder - sweep hurtles across in the deep but fails to cut it off
defended on the front-foot
turned away with the spin to the midwicket region
another one down the leg side
worked away towards midwicket
tossed up outside the off stump, driven away towards cover
flicked off the pads to the square leg region
short and wide outside the off stump, was there to cut but Morton fails to cash in

Morton departs, done in by the arm ball - pitched on and around the middle and off stump line and this one went straight on at a fairly decent pace. Morton goes back and plays across the line - turned out to be a notting shot in the end and the off stump is pegged back
driven wide of the fielder at cover
left alone outside the off stump
pitched outside the off stump and turning away - Simmons goes back and across and cuts hard but for the nth time fails to get it through the packed off-side square
again cut away hard but straight to the fielder at point. He has been playing the cut shot beautifully but so far the placement has been poor
short ball. Smith goes back and pulls it away to the midwicket fence - bad delivery put away in style
defended on the back-foot and the ball rolls down to silly mid-on
again slightly short but this time the pull shot finds the fielder at square leg
worked away against the turn to the square leg region
another short delivery and this one keeps low - Smith goes low down and pulls it away behind square on the leg side
width offered outside the off stump - Simmons cuts but fails to make contact
played away towards cover
quicker delivery on the stumps, defended watchfully
cut away off the back-foot. Straight to the fielder at cover, excellent over so far
forced away towards cover point, fielder moves across quickly and cuts off the single

short and wide outside the off stump, ball kept low after hitting the deck - Smith pulls across then line and ends up with a bottom edge. Lucky the ball missed the off stump and went on to hit Akmal on his left boot - close call
cut to point and again straight ot the fielder - so what's new
driven away square on the off side
waits for the ball and runs it down to third man for a single
tucked away towards square leg
driven down to long-on for a single
full and on the stumps, defended on the back-foot. Another good over for Pakistan comes to an end
steered away towards cover point
plays across the line and the ball goes through to the keeper
nudged past the fielder at midwicket
defended outside the off stump
worked away right into the gap between mid-on and midwicket
tossed up and turning away - Simmons gets well forward and glides it away towards gully
in the slot and Smith slogs it past the diving fielder at square leg - welcome boundary for West Indies
turning in, Smith fails to make contact and the ball pops up on the leg side after clipping the pad
turning onto middle and leg, Smith goes right back and turns it away behind square on the leg side
driven away off the front-foot and gets it away through cover point
beaten outside the off stump - done in but the extra bounce there
worked away off the back-foot to the midwicket region
swept away towards square leg
Smith too goes for the sweep and get it away through the gap on the leg side
cut straight to the fielder at point
goes for the sweep but fails to make contact
again cut to point - no room for a single there
left alone outside the off stump - wise decision - why make the effort with all the shots going straight to the fielders
what light. Short delivery on the stumps and Smith pulls it over the square leg fence, Viv style - meaty blow,
good length delivery, driven down to long-on for an easy single
on the stumps, Simmons goes for the flick on the leg side and the ball rolls away towards point
short delivery down the leg side - Smith shapes up for the pulls but in the end leaves it through to the keeper
excellent change of pace - Smith picks it up late but safely plays it towards short cover
good length delivery, this one hits the seam and nips back in sharply - Smith does well to get bat on bowl
bowled'm! yorker on the middle and leg stump line  - hint of reversing and Smith plays all over it -  leg stumps goes for a walk. Gul gets his revenge, West Indies 6 down.
forced away off the back-foot to the point region
slightly short. Ramdin stands tall on the back-foot and works it away towards midwicket
Simmons continues to impress. Quicker delivery outside the off stump, Simmons nicely opens the face of the bat and runs it past the fielder at short third man
worked away well in front of square leg
driven wide of the fielder at midwicket
close to the off stump line. Simmons once agian opens the face of the bat and runs it wide of the fielder at short third man
short of a good length delivery on the middle and off stump line. Simmons makes room and cuts it down to third man. bit of edge involved and the ball was in the air for a long time

full and drifting down the leg side, wrong line and length from Gul. Ramdin shuffles across and clips it down to the fine leg fence - valiant diving effort in the deep from Naved-ul-Hasan ends in Vain
short rising delivery, in the channel outside the off stump and the ball sails through to the keeper - Ramdin did well to get out of the way
excellent delivery - again close to the off stump line and Ramdin was clueless
clipped off the pads to the long-leg fence. well played
this one nipped back in a long way and the ball rolls away off the pad - missing leg and the appeal is duly turned down
Slower delivery, landed on a length, around leg and middle, bounced up even as it held its line and beat the intended swipe across the line

Crash! Simmons backs up even before the release, Naved pings the blockhole and bang. The furniture is disturbed. Simmons was trying to drive square on the off side. A very good innings from the youngster.
full, furious, outside off, Bradshaw has a stab at it, doesn't connect and the ball whistles into Akmal's gloves

inn2.comm: poor start, quick ball down the leg side, swings wide of Hafeez's pads, Ramdin takes, and thats a wide says umpire Asad Rauf

fullish on middle and leg, worked away past midwicket, theres some confusion going for the second run, Ramdin moves in front of the stumps and flicks the ball to Ganga, who had already hit the stumps before he got the ball, in the end he desperately tried to pull the stumps out, but by then the batsman was safe
full and wide of off stump, an outswinger, play and miss
full again, and he swings and misses once more
short, lifting delivery outside off stump, he sways away
good length ball outside off stump jags in but he opens the face and runs that down to third man for one
fullish ball outside the off stump, moves across him, he leaves it be
full on off stump, Hafeez walks across and flicks to the right of mid-on for a single
full ball outside off stump, pitches and deviates away sharply, Farhat not interested in it, Ramdin collects
full down the leg side, theres a sound there as it passes Farhat's pads, Ramdin takes and the umpire signals wide,even though the noise suggested it may have clipped the pad
full outside off stump, stays lower on this occasion, Farhat covers his off stump and watches it into Ramdin's gloves
good length ball moves in from off stump, Farhat presents the full face of the bat, ends up getting an outer edge thats shoots along the ground past point for one
drifts full on the pads, wristily worked wide of square leg for one, man in the deep does the fielding
drifts down leg side again, Farhat looks to tickle it fine but doesnt make contact, ball clips the pad and they settle with the leg bye
good length ball on off stump, Farhat goes back, looking to work that through mid-wicket, doesnt time it well but makes enough contact to pick up one in front of square leg
lands on a good length on off stump and swings into him, he adjusts well and works that to the onside, Farhat's down the track and gets sent back, confusion again between these two
lands on a back of a length and gets some kick off the pitch, Hafeez comes forward and pokes at it, beaten
quicker delivery on a shortish length outside off stump, this one stands up too and catches Hafeez by surprise, but the soft hands ensure he'll get one in front of point
good length ball on off stump, he makes room and drives to point
straight, good length ball on the stumps, Farhat is right behind it and shows the bowler the full face of the bat as he defends
good ball on the stump, middle and off line, Hafeez gets behind and taps that to the on side, no chance of a run as the fielder from square leg swoops in
oh ho! Hafeez gives him the charge, Bradshaw sees it and alters  the line, pitches it wide of him and he makes no contact with his swing, umpire calls it wide
extra bounce on that ball, lands on middle and off and catches him on the gloves, manages to keep it down in front of square leg
another one lands outside off stump and kicks steeply, Hafeez hops and chases it, doesnt get bat on it and Ramdin takes that over his head
quicker ball, not as short, the ball holds its line and Hafeez hops and defends with an angled bat, very nearly chopped onto off stump
a tad fuller on this occasion, still manages to square him up, but the use of the soft hands gets him a very quick single into the covers
full outside off stump, minimal away movement there and Farhat stands leaden-footed and goes fishing, good ball to end a good over
banged in short on off stump, Hafeez is quickly into his pull shot, not timed well but gets enough to carry if over the midwicket region, ball lands safely and they get a run
fullish ball on off stump, an impetuous Farhat gives him the charge, tries to smash that down the ground but doesnt time it well, chops into the ground and the bowler collects
full outside off stump, he flashes at it and gets a thickish edge along the ground in the gully gap for one
quicker ball on leg stump and moving down, he looks to flicks but gets rapped on the leg, outside the line, clearly
full and wide of off stump, invites the drive and Hafeez obliges with an exaggerated attempt at a cover drive, he cant make contact and its called wide anyway
full again outside off stump, Hafeez's feet go nowhere and he drives again, feeling for that ball, but again he's nowhere near it
lands on a back of a length outside off stump, Hafeez goes back and splices that unconvincingly through point for one
short ball down leg stump, very wide and its duly called so by the umpire, Hafeez was into his pull shot early but couldnt make contact
another shocker way outside leg stump, swings very late too and evades Ramdin's dive to his left, extras conceded all the way to the ropes, poor bowling
better, better, good length ball on the stumps, Hafeez plays that with soft hands and pushes into the covers for one
good length ball on middle and off, he looks to tap it into midwicket but not timed well, ends up dropping it near his feet
fullish ball outside off stump, and thats a wild slog from Farhat, gave it the proverbial kitchen sink and made zero contact
dropped in short, he pulls well and picks up one through square leg
dropped! Short ball on leg stump, Hafeez pulls that straight to Simmons at square leg, who cups his hands in front of his face, and its in and out, and a run, poor stuff
quick ball on off stump, hustles Farhat into his defence, works the ball into the on side
short of a good length outside off stump, he makes room and drives towards point
banged in short outside off stump, moves in quickly, Farhat looks to pull but backs away too far and takes his eyes of it, ball takes the handle of the bat and flies through gully
fired in on leg stump, he looks to flick but doesnt time it well, inside edge onto the pads it seems
shot! Dropped in short, Hafeez swivels and pulls that well over square leg, one bounce and over the ropes for four
good length ball but going down leg stump, he tries to tickle it fine but doesnt time it, picks up a leg bye anyhow
full outside off stump, swings away, slower ball, Farhat leans out and tries to slap it backward of point but can only chop it into the ground
full outside leg stump, he's hustled into his defence, ends up with a leg bye
dropped in short on the stumps, Farhat backs away and tries a pull of some sort, makes so much room that in the end all he can do is look ugly as he spins around in the shot without making contact
rubbish ball, very wide of leg stump, Ramdin collects
good length on the stumps, Farhat quickly into his defence
dropped in short again, and Farhat backs away from the stumps, this time he does make contact and slams that high over point for a screaching four,shot!
fullish ball outside off stump, changed the pace on that one, Farhat shuffles across and uses soft hands to dab it into the off side, sets off but sent back by Hafeez
full ball angling down leg stump, should have been a wide but Farhat has moved so far outside leg that he takes it on the pads, ball brushes him and runs fine, Ramdin collects it
good length ball pitches on middle and leg and moves in to catch him somewher high on the inner thigh, as he was looking to work that off the pads
good length ball outside off stump, Farhat backs away and tries to slap that over point, cant make contact
fullish and slanting down leg stump, he tries to play it but gets rapped on the pad, bowler appeals but that was going too far down leg stump
back of a good length and moves in slighly, Hafeez stands and plays with soft hands in front of backward point for the run
shortish length and going down leg, Farhat shuffles and tries to flick that around the corner, not timed but he gets a leg bye
good, full ball outside off stump, Hafeez judges it and drops the hands to let it pass through safely
fullish ball outside off stump, Farhat backs away to leg and tries to cream that through the off side, makes no contact, he's really reckless today
and again he makes room, manages to get bat on it but thats straight to point, he took that ball from about middle and off!
not that short but he pulls from outside off stump to wide of Corey Collymore at mid-on, who dives and saves runs
back of a good length ball on off stump, Hafeez drops that at his feet, thought about the run but resists as the bowler moves in
drifts to middle and leg and he places that wide of square leg and takes one

full outside off stump, Farhat backs away to leg for the umpteenth time but gets this one off the meat of the bat, carving it high over backward point, and the ball lands safely and trickles over the ropes
flat ball on middle and leg, worked right to square leg
tossed up this time a little more, lands on middle and leg and Hafeez goes down on one knee and slog-sweeps that well over deep midwicket for six, and the ball boy drops it!
quicker ball on the stumps, driven to mid-off
flatter on leg stump, swept past backward of square for one
flighted outside off stump, Farhat tries the reverse sweep but cant make contact
changes his line to flatter and wider of off stump, Farhat comes forward, shuffles, and ends up smacking that towards point
full outside off stump and swings in, staying low, and Hafeez tries an ambitious slog across the line, but cant make contact
short and wide, crunched to Morton at backward point who dives and saves runs
bad ball, really bad, lands miles outside of off stump, and thats the 12th wide of the innings so far
slower ball, full on off stump, he defends back to Smith
a tad wider and not as full, Hafeez intelligently plays that wide of point for one, a sloppy throw and a lack of backing up allows the second run
full outside off stump, he plays that late and with soft hands, running it down to third man for one
fullish on middle and leg, he gives the charge but cant time the swipe well enough, ball rolls to the man at midwicket
tossed up one leg stump, Hafeez gets down onto one knee and sweeps hard, times it well in the gap behind square and gets four more
tossed up outside off stump, he looks to drive but gets an inside edge towards point
flighted outside off stump, he gets down and tries to square-drive, mistimed, Ramdin collects
quicker ball on the stumps, defended back to Gayle

what a catch! Tossed up on middle and off, Hafeez again goes down and tries the slog-sweep, not timed as well as the previous attempts, ends up slamming it high down towards a very wide long-on, looks like its going for maximum but Taylor times his jump to perfection and pouches it above his head, great stuff and Gayle gets the breakthrough
tossed up outside off stump, Akmal plays forward and gets rapped on the pads, Gayle appeals but Rauf is unmoved
short outside off stump, cut past point
fullish outside off stump, he looks to drive through covers but cant beat the gap
pitches short on leg stump, pulled through backward of square, the placement is good, Ganga covers good ground and dives, but ends up pushing the ball over the ropes
good ball! Lands outside off, kicks and squares him up, misses the edge of  the bat
short outside off stump, Akmal stands and flashes the square-cut uppishly over point for four, aggressive intent
good, straight ball on off stump, Akmal defends back to Smith
tossed up outside off stump, he runs that off the face of  the bat in the gap at gully
tossed up on off stump, Akmal comes forward and drives down to mid-on for one
flatter trajectory on middle and leg, Farhat laps that around the corner for three, Collymore has work to do fielding it
quicker ball outside off stump, Akmal judges it and drives into the covers for the quick single
arm ball outside off stump, Farhat comes forward, bat and pad married in defence, and pushed into the covers
tossed up outside off stump, he comes forward and drives, mistimes and gets an inside edge to midwicket
good length ball angled across him, Farhat opens the face and runs it down to third man

dropped! Full outside off stump, Akmal flashes the drive, takes the thick edge wide of Lara at first slip, who dives to his right and gets fingers on it, was a difficult chance but should have been taken
wide ball down leg side, Farhat looks to flick but misses, Ramdin dives to his right and takes it
fullish outside leg stump, catches Farhat on the pads, they pinch a leg bye to point
good length ball outside off stump comes in, defended back to the bowler
good length outside off stump, he goes back and smacks that off the backfoot towards mid-off, not a great shot and a worse effort from Collymore who fumbles it and gives away runs
dropped in short, pulled over square leg out to Ganga on the ropes, who fields it on the bounce
flat on the stumps, Akmal goes back and punches it to mid-on
tossed up outside off, Farhat stands and drives off the backfoot in the gap at covers, wants two all the while and gets them easily
tossed up on middle and leg, worked to mid-on, sets off, sent back by Akmal
tossed up on off stump, he gets forward and drives to Collymore at mid-off
tossed up outside off stump, Farhat reverse sweeps, fails to make contact, and an animated Ramdin makes a loud appeal, Gayle joins in feebly, umpire not even buying it
flatter on middle and off, driven to mid-on, no chance of a run
good ball to begin with, good length on the stumps, Farhat stands and defends back to the bowler
pitches short, he pulls, not timed well but gets a quick run in front of squar leg
good length ball jags back in from outside off stump and catches Akmal high on the pads above the stumps
good, moving ball angled across him from off stump, he fishes and is beaten
good length ball outside off stump, Farhat opens the face and squeezes that to the left of Simmons at backward point for one
wide of off stump, he plays that down and in the gap at gully, wants two and runs hard, ends up getting it comfortably
tossed up on off stump, spins in, raps Farhat, didnt spin across him much, a good shout from Gayle, Rauf shakes his head, some doubt in his mind as to whether it would have hit leg stump
quicker ball outside off stump,  pushed into the covers for one
flatter on leg stump, Akmal tries to flick, gets beaten and the ball rolls to the off side
tossed up on leg stump and spins away, Akmal goes for the sweep, looks to have gotten glove on that, umpire Rauf asks Akmal and he says yeah, and the umpire say yep, okay then
quicker ball on the stumps, defended

gone! Tossed up on leg stump, Akmal gets a huge stride forward and goes for the sweep again, ball kisses the gloves and Ramdin takes it neatly, appeals, but Gayle's so confident that he doesnt even look back at the umpire, just breaks out in a smile and walks down towards Ramdin, and behind him Rauf lifts the dreaded finger
good length ball on off stump, drops the hands and defends into the covers

full outside off stump, Farhat tries to flick, gets rapped on the pads, Collymore appeals, umpire Llong says nope, outside the line, and they steal a couple leg byes, the overthrow allowing the second
full and wider this time, Farhat covers off stump and watches it through to Ramdin
maximum! Farhat gives him the charge, backing away, and gets under it with some power and smashes that high over the covers for six, shot!
good, seaming ball outside off stump, Farhat stands and pokes at it, ball misses shaving the edge of the bat, loose shot
a good, quick ball outside off stump stands up and again Farhat chases it and gets beaten
short rising delivery outside the off stump, came back in a touch and Yousuf is beaten outside the off stump - excellent delivery first up
and again - good length and this one kepts its line after hitting the deck. Yousuf has a poke at it and the ball zips past the outside edge

defended on the back-foot and the ball rolls away behind the stumps on the off side, Ramdin's throw at the striker's end misses the target by a long away and runs down to the wide long-on fence - 5 runs added to the total.
off the pads to the short fine leg region
played back to the bowler
worked away towards midwicket for an easy single - end of a good over for Pakistan
good length delivery on the middle and leg stump line, Yousuf waits for the ball and works it away behind square on the leg side
Farhat continues on his merry way - short of a good length delivery on the stumps, Farhat comes down the track and swings across the line - missed the target by miles there
better shot - good length delivery outside the off stump. Farhat plays late, square drives it through point for a single
leg-cutter outside the off stump. Bit too wide to trouble Yousuf
this one nipped back in. Yousuf gets right behind the line and defends it with a straight bat
beauty to end the over. Reared off good length and Yousuf is left searching for the ball - through to the keeper.
slightly short and on the middle and off stump line - Farhat goes for the pull and gets it over the fielder at mid-on.

pitched up outside the off stump and this time Farhat hammers it straight back past the bowler to the long-on fence. Was in the slot alright but Farhat did well to get it wide of the fielder at mid-on. The required rate is melting and West Indies badly need a wicket here
worked away well wide of the fielder at midwicket
pulled away through midwicket for a single

short ball outside the off stump - Farhat shuffles across and for a moment it looked like he had lost sight of the ball but at the last moment he scooped it away from under the bounce to the fine leg fence - innovative shot. Pakistan racing away at this stage
short ball and this time Farhat leaves it through to the keeper
driven to point, no room for a single there
steered down to third man for an easy single
short of a good length delivery outside the off stump - another single down to third man
way down the leg side and the extras contines to mount
goes for the drive outside the off stump but fails to connet
defended to point and they scamper through for a single
steered down to third man and an easy single takes him to fifty.
turned away off the back-foot to the square leg region
short and drifting down the leg side. Pulled away to deep backward square leg for a single
edged away towards short third man - Yousuf was looking to work it away on the leg side
tossed up and turning in. Yousuf waits for the ball and effortlessly drives it down to long-on for a single
comes down the track to the pitch of the delivery and swats it over the long-on fence - try stopping that
cut away off the back-foot to deep point

and gone! 43 required off 59 balls and Farhat swings his bat around as if they require 430 off 59 balls - ball clips the top edge and balloons up towards long-off. Samuels moves in from the deep and nicely settles under it.
good length delivery on the middle and leg stump line, Yousuf fails to make contact and the ball rolls away off the pad
line and length delivery outside the off stump, defended on the front-foot
this one cuts back in. Yousuf goes back to defend and ends up with an inside edge.
in the channel outside the off stump, Yousuf watches it all the way into Ramdin's gloves
beaten outside the off stump and that's a wicket maiden
short of a good length delivery outside the off stump, no shot offered
glided down to third man and they walk across for a single
short of a good length delivery, the in-dipper as they call it in Pakistan. Yousuf gets right behind the line and defends it with a straight bat
Taylor drifts onto middle and leg. Yousuf shuffles across the line and tucks it down to fine leg for an easy single. 150 comes up for Pakistan, just 41 more needed now
punched wide of the fielder at cover and they scamper through for a single - that's the way to do it
again glanced away to fine leg for an easy single
not again! short and wide outside the off stump. Yousuf goes for the cut but fails to make contact and the wide takes the extras tally to 26
good length delivery on the stumps, Yousuf nicely works it away towards midwicket
short of a good length delivery outside the off stump. Malik plays an awkward looking defensive shot and the ball zips past the outside edge
close to the off stump line. Malik looking to work it away towards midwicket ends up with a leading edge and the ball rolls away towards short cover
pitched up outside the off stump and Malik plays all over it - he is struggling out there, no doubt
good length delivery outside the off stump, Malik reads it well and leaves it through to the keeper
fuller and in the channel outside the off stump, defended straight to the fielder at cover. End of a fantastic over from Collymore
tucked away off the pads to long-leg, 36 more needed
short and wide outside the off stump - Malik leans back and cuts it away through cover point. Sweeper moves across quickly in the deep and cuts of the second run

short of a good length delivery outside the off stump, Yousuf stands tall on the back-foot and drives it down to third man for a single. Nicely opened the face of the bat at the point of impact to get the placement right
short rising delivery and this one nipped back in. Malik gets behind the line and defends it down on the off side
fuller length delivery on the middle and leg stump line. Malik leans forward and clips it away in the air to the deep midwicket region, runs hard and comfortably makes it back for the third.
turned away with an hint of artistry and then they ran like sprinters - got it well in front of square leg and the fielder in the deep had to move across a long way to cut it off - excellent cricket
left alone outside the off stump, they can afford to do that
short of a good length delivery, right in the channel and cutting in. Malik gets right behind the line and defends it away towards cover
another off-cutter. Malik shoulders arms but the ball came in with the angle and rolled away off the pad, just a faint touch. Half hearted appeal for lbw turned down
beaten outside the off stump - this is fantastic stuff from Collymore
another lovely delivery outside the off stump and this time the edge is produced, but the ball files through the big gap between the keeper and Gayle at first slip. Collymore unlucky there
another peach of a delivery outside the off stump and this one turns Malik inside out - another fine over from Collymore comes to an end.
clipped away to fine leg
way down the leg side - atrocious delivery and the extras tally moves up to 27
driven down to mid-on
bit of frustration creeping in - Malik comes down the track and swing hard, ball sails through to the keeper
much better shot. short of a good length delivery outside the off stump. Malik waits for the ball and at the last moment runs it down to third man for a single
nicely opens the face of the bat and runs it down to short third man
good length delivery outside the off stump and Malik jabs it through extra cover for a brace - deliberately hit in the air and he placed it to perfection
oh dear! good length delivery, drifting down the leg side and that's another wide
short and angling across the right-hander. Yousuf stands his ground and steers it down to third man. Made it look easy
again drifting down the leg side. wrong line and length from Bradshaw, Malik fails to make contact but the ball clips the pad and runs down to third man
short and angling across - swing and a miss outside the off stump
good length delivery on the middle and off stump line. Malik pushes forward and thuds it down to long-on for a single. Presented the full face of the bat there
angled away behind point. Smith moves across quickly and cuts off the single
pitched up and Yousuf drives it straight back down the track. Bradshaw moves across to his left and the half-stop cuts off a single
comes down the track and works it away towards midwicket, awkward looking shot and the ball beats the diving fielder at short midwicket
another wide, so what's new? again way down the leg side and Ramdin fails to collect it cleanly
tossed up outside the off stump, Yousuf goes low down and paddles it down to fine leg for a single - it's looking all to easy at the moment
worked away well wide of the fielder at short fine leg
flatter delivery outside the off stump and Yousuf punches it well wide of the fielder at cover - Pakistan inch closer
turned away towards midwicket - no room for a single there
game, set and match! good length delivery outside the off stump. Yousuf gets a good stride in towards the line of the ball and square drives it point. what a player
short of a good length delivery, hint of swing and Yousuf is beaten on the forward prod
pushed away towards cover and they scamper through for a single

all over! good length delivery, pitched in line and angling across. Malik stands tall and drives hard, ball clips the inside edge and races away to the vacant fine leg fence - Pakistan win by 7 wickets.
